summary:
A starter home situated on the shores of Lake Ilnata, ideally themed for an Alchemist or Hunter.
Not a large home, and not overly opulent, but has nice features for those looking for something minimal rather than extravagant.
descriptionHtml:
REQUIRES: HEARTHFIRE, DAWNGUARD AND DRAGONBORN TO FUNCTION PROPERLY.

This housing mod places a small minimalist home themed around an Alchemist, though it
could also be suitable for hunters or hermit mages as well.
You’ll find it situated on the shores of Lake Ilnata, just South of the Lady Stone and far
West of Riverwood if you follow the road to Falkreath. The site features a grand view of
the misty lake which can be seen from the shack’s porch or from the firepit near the exterior oven.
An exterior greenhouse for planting alchemical herbs or humble crops is fully functional
and a tanning rack with leather storage is placed near the main entrance of the home.

Interior features include a fully navmeshed area for followers.
A Kitchen complete with Cooking Pot and Storage (please note that ALL barrels and burlap
sacks inside and outside the premises are NOT safe for storage.)

An alchemy nook with plenty of organised storage space.

Two Weapon Racks near the main entrance.

Plenty of chests, shelves, wardrobes, knapsacks and end tables to store gear, books and supplies.

I don’t see it necessary, but if people desire it, I may add a basement to the property.


The home is designed to be a starter home or something in mind for those tired of seeing
overly extravagant features in their dwellings. As such, players who are devoted Collectors of
unique items in the game, won’t find a lot of space to showcase their trophies. I may upgrade
the place into something bigger, but that will be a separate mod for another time.
author: Sundaysmile - Deacon
